name: Easy Beer Bread Mix
author: Kory H.
summary: I combine all the dry ingredients and put them in quart canning jars or quart size ziploc bags and give as gifts. All the recipient needs to add is the can of beer and butter over the top of the loaf. You know you have a winner when people ask for the recipe!
ingredients: ¼ cup butter or margarine, melted
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x5 inch baking pan
In a bowl, mix the self-rising flour, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, onion powder, and Italian seasoning
Pour in the beer, and mix just until moistened
Transfer to the prepared baking pan
Bake 45 to 55 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean
